Description: Steady-state @DRUG$ plasma concentrations were a few-fold higher than in the absence of @DRUG$.

Description: Co-administration of @DRUG$ kept the plasma concentrations of @DRUG$ (a CYP3A4 substrate) at approximately 50%.
